custom-action.name: subscribe
custom-action.description:
Subscribe to a topic on an MQTT broker.
Possible parameters are: - BrokerAlias (optional): Alias identifying the broker to subscribe to.Assumes and requires that, for the current User Path, a connection (using the ConnectAction) has been established and associated to the specified BrokerAlias. If User Path connects to one broker only, this parameter can be left out. - Topic (required): The topic on which to subscribe. - QoS (optional): A Quality of Service Level (QoS) for this message, the level (0,1 or 2) determines the maximum quality of service at which to subscribe. Default value is "0".
